languages.text: Осмотр подтвердил первоначальную гипотезу техноматов — в сервиторах проснулись души тех, кем они были прежде. Не до конца осознавая свое прошлое и настоящее, эти полумашины испытывали примитивные эмоции, были способны ощущать боль и страх. Это известное последствие скверного лоботомирования встречается крайне редко, но по какой-то причине вскрылось у всех собранных перед нами сервиторов.

traits.locale_text: Осмотр подтвердил первоначальную гипотезу техноматов — в сервиторах проснулись души тех, кем они были прежде. Не до конца осознавая свое прошлое и настоящее, эти полумашины испытывали примитивные эмоции, были способны ощущать боль и страх. Это известное последствие скверного лоботомирования встречается крайне редко, но по какой-то причине вскрылось у всех собранных перед нами сервиторов.

languages.text: The examination confirmed the technomats' initial hypothesis: the servitors' souls — or rather, the souls of the people they once were — had awakened. Not yet fully conscious of their past and present, these half-machines could nonetheless feel primitive emotions and sensations such as fear and pain. This undesirable consequence of shoddily performed lobotomy is most rarely observed, and yet, for some unknown reason, it had occurred in every single one of the servitors gathered in the bay.
languages.original_text: Осмотр подтвердил первоначальную гипотезу техноматов — в сервиторах проснулись души тех, кем они были прежде. Не до конца осознавая свое прошлое и настоящее, эти полумашины испытывали примитивные эмоции, были способны ощущать боль и страх. Это известное последствие скверного лоботомирования встречается крайне редко, но по какой-то причине вскрылось у всех собранных перед нами сервиторов.

Not yet fully conscious of their past and present, these half-machines could nonetheless feel primitive emotions and sensations such as fear and pain. This undesirable consequence of shoddily performed lobotomy is most rarely observed, and yet, for some unknown reason, it had occurred in every single one of the servitors gathered in the bay.

This undesirable consequence of shoddily performed lobotomy is most rarely observed, and yet, for some unknown reason, it had occurred in every single one of the servitors gathered in the bay.

This undesirable consequence of shoddily performed lobotomy is most rarely observed, and yet, for some unknown reason, it had occurred in every single one of the servitors gathered in the bay.

The examination confirmed the technomats' initial hypothesis: the servitors' souls — or rather, the souls of the people they once were — had awakened. Not yet fully conscious of their past and present, these half-machines could nonetheless feel primitive emotions and sensations such as fear and pain. This undesirable consequence of shoddily performed lobotomy is most rarely observed, and yet, for some unknown reason, it had occurred in every single one of the servitors gathered in the bay.

languages.text: 調査の結果、テクノマットの初期の仮説が確認さた。サーヴィターの魂、あるいはむしろ、かつての人であった魂が目を覚ました。まだ完全に過去と現在を意識できるわけではないが、これらの半機械は原始的な感情や恐怖、痛みなどの感覚を感じることができる。この、粗雑なロボトミー手術の結果としての好ましくない結果は、非常にまれにしか観察されず、それも理由が不明のままだが、このベイに集まったサーヴィターのすべてで発生していた。
languages.original_text: The examination confirmed the technomats' initial hypothesis: the servitors' souls — or rather, the souls of the people they once were — had awakened. Not yet fully conscious of their past and present, these half-machines could nonetheless feel primitive emotions and sensations such as fear and pain. This undesirable consequence of shoddily performed lobotomy is most rarely observed, and yet, for some unknown reason, it had occurred in every single one of the servitors gathered in the bay.

traits.locale_text: 調査の結果、テクノマットの初期の仮説が確認さた。サーヴィターの魂、あるいはむしろ、かつての人であった魂が目を覚ました。まだ完全に過去と現在を意識できるわけではないが、これらの半機械は原始的な感情や恐怖、痛みなどの感覚を感じることができる。この、粗雑なロボトミー手術の結果としての好ましくない結果は、非常にまれにしか観察されず、それも理由が不明のままだが、このベイに集まったサーヴィターのすべてで発生していた。

languages.text: L'examen confirma l'hypothèse initiale des technomates : les âmes des servitors – ou plutôt, les âmes des personnes qu'ils avaient été autrefois – s'étaient réveillées. Si ces semi-machines n'étaient pas encore totalement conscientes de leur passé ou de leur présent, elles pouvaient néanmoins ressentir des émotions et des sensations primitives telles que la peur et la douleur. On observe rarement cette conséquence indésirable d'une lobotomie mal exécutée. Toutefois, pour une raison qui nous échappe encore, tous les servitors réunis dans la soute étaient atteints, sans la moindre exception.
languages.original_text: The examination confirmed the technomats' initial hypothesis: the servitors' souls — or rather, the souls of the people they once were — had awakened. Not yet fully conscious of their past and present, these half-machines could nonetheless feel primitive emotions and sensations such as fear and pain. This undesirable consequence of shoddily performed lobotomy is most rarely observed, and yet, for some unknown reason, it had occurred in every single one of the servitors gathered in the bay.

traits.locale_text: L'examen confirma l'hypothèse initiale des technomates : les âmes des servitors – ou plutôt, les âmes des personnes qu'ils avaient été autrefois – s'étaient réveillées. Si ces semi-machines n'étaient pas encore totalement conscientes de leur passé ou de leur présent, elles pouvaient néanmoins ressentir des émotions et des sensations primitives telles que la peur et la douleur. On observe rarement cette conséquence indésirable d'une lobotomie mal exécutée. Toutefois, pour une raison qui nous échappe encore, tous les servitors réunis dans la soute étaient atteints, sans la moindre exception.

languages.text: 这次检查结果证实了技工最初的假设——这些机仆的灵魂，或者说他们曾有过的灵魂，已经苏醒过来。目前，这些半机械人还没有完全意识到自己的过去与现在，但却能感受到原始的情绪和感觉，例如恐惧、疼痛等等。脑叶切除手术极少会产生这样的不良后果，但不知什么原因，此刻聚集在这片区域中的每位机仆都出现了这样的情况。
languages.original_text: The examination confirmed the technomats' initial hypothesis: the servitors' souls — or rather, the souls of the people they once were — had awakened. Not yet fully conscious of their past and present, these half-machines could nonetheless feel primitive emotions and sensations such as fear and pain. This undesirable consequence of shoddily performed lobotomy is most rarely observed, and yet, for some unknown reason, it had occurred in every single one of the servitors gathered in the bay.

traits.locale_text: 这次检查结果证实了技工最初的假设——这些奴工的灵魂，或者说他们曾有过的灵魂，已经苏醒过来。目前，这些半机械人还没有完全意识到自己的过去与现在，但却能感受到原始的情绪和感觉，例如恐惧、疼痛等等。脑叶切除手术极少会产生这样的不良后果，但不知什么原因，此刻聚集在这片区域中的每位奴工都出现了这样的情况。

languages.text: El examen confirmó la hipótesis inicial de los tecnómatas: las almas de los servidores o, mejor dicho, de las personas que una vez fueron habían despertado. Aunque aún no poseían una consciencia completa de su presente y su pasado, las medio máquinas podían sentir emociones y sensaciones primitivas como el miedo y el dolor. Esta consecuencia indeseable de una lobotomía deficiente es muy poco frecuente, y, sin embargo, por algún motivo, se había manifestado en cada uno de los servidores de la bahía.
languages.original_text: The examination confirmed the technomats' initial hypothesis: the servitors' souls — or rather, the souls of the people they once were — had awakened. Not yet fully conscious of their past and present, these half-machines could nonetheless feel primitive emotions and sensations such as fear and pain. This undesirable consequence of shoddily performed lobotomy is most rarely observed, and yet, for some unknown reason, it had occurred in every single one of the servitors gathered in the bay.

traits.locale_text: El examen confirmó la hipótesis inicial de los tecnómatas: las almas de los servidores o, mejor dicho, de las personas que una vez fueron habían despertado. Aunque aún no poseían una consciencia completa de su presente y su pasado, las medio máquinas podían sentir emociones y sensaciones primitivas como el miedo y el dolor. Esta consecuencia indeseable de una lobotomía deficiente es muy poco frecuente, y, sin embargo, por algún motivo, se había manifestado en cada uno de los servidores de la bahía.

languages.text: Die Untersuchung bestätigte die ursprüngliche Hypothese der Technomaten: Die Seelen der Servitoren waren erwacht — oder besser die Seelen der Menschen, die sie einst gewesen waren. Diese Halbmaschinen waren ihrer Vergangenheit und Gegenwart noch nicht vollständig gewahr, konnten aber dennoch primitive Emotionen und Empfindungen wie Angst und Schmerz spüren. Diese unerwünschte Folge einer schlampig durchgeführten Lobotomie ist höchst selten, und doch war sie aus irgendeinem unbekannten Grund bei jedem einzelnen der Servitoren in diesem Modul aufgetreten.
languages.original_text: The examination confirmed the technomats' initial hypothesis: the servitors' souls — or rather, the souls of the people they once were — had awakened. Not yet fully conscious of their past and present, these half-machines could nonetheless feel primitive emotions and sensations such as fear and pain. This undesirable consequence of shoddily performed lobotomy is most rarely observed, and yet, for some unknown reason, it had occurred in every single one of the servitors gathered in the bay.

traits.locale_text: Die Untersuchung bestätigte die ursprüngliche Hypothese der Technomaten: Die Seelen der Servitoren waren erwacht — oder besser die Seelen der Menschen, die sie einst gewesen waren. Diese Halbmaschinen waren ihrer Vergangenheit und Gegenwart noch nicht vollständig gewahr, konnten aber dennoch primitive Emotionen und Empfindungen wie Angst und Schmerz spüren. Diese unerwünschte Folge einer schlampig durchgeführten Lobotomie ist höchst selten, und doch war sie aus irgendeinem unbekannten Grund bei jedem einzelnen der Servitoren in diesem Modul aufgetreten.

languages.text: İnceleme sonucunda teknomatların ilk varsayımları doğrulanmış oldu: Hizmetörlerin ruhları, yani vaktinde insan bedenlerini mesken tutan ruhlar uyanmıştı. Dününü yahut bugününü tam idrak edemeyen bu makinemsiler, ilkel duyguları ve korkuyla acı gibi hisleri yaşayabiliyordu. Üstünkörü lobotomi işlemlerinin istenmeyen bir yan etkisi olan bu durum, hayli ender rastlanan bir hadise olmasına karşın bilinmeyen bir sebepten ötürü bölmeye yerleştirilen her bir hizmetörde gözlenmişti.
languages.original_text: The examination confirmed the technomats' initial hypothesis: the servitors' souls — or rather, the souls of the people they once were — had awakened. Not yet fully conscious of their past and present, these half-machines could nonetheless feel primitive emotions and sensations such as fear and pain. This undesirable consequence of shoddily performed lobotomy is most rarely observed, and yet, for some unknown reason, it had occurred in every single one of the servitors gathered in the bay.

traits.locale_text: İnceleme sonucunda teknomatların ilk varsayımları doğrulanmış oldu: Hizmetörlerin ruhları, yani vaktinde insan bedenlerini mesken tutan ruhlar, uyanmıştı. Dününü yahut bugününü tam idrak edemeyen bu makinemsiler, ilkel duyguları ve korkuyla acı gibi hisleri yaşayabiliyordu. Üstünkörü lobotomi işlemlerinin istenmeyen bir yan etkisi olan bu durum, hayli ender rastlanan bir hadise olmasına karşın bilinmeyen bir sebepten ötürü bölmeye yerleştirilen her bir hizmetörde gözlenmişti.
